parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow. To rerieve a list of workflow IDs, use  ListWorkflows.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project in the space.

nested_items.name: projectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project in the space.

nested_items.name: sourceRepositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the source repository where the workflow YAML is stored.

nested_items.name: sourceBranchName
nested_items.description: The name of the branch that contains the workflow YAML.

nested_items.name: definition
nested_items.description: Information about the workflow definition file for the workflow.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The path to the workflow definition file stored in the source repository for the project, including the file name.

nested_items.name: createdTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the workflow was created, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the workflow was last updated, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339

nested_items.name: runMode
nested_items.description: The behavior to use when multiple workflows occur at the same time. For more information, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/codecatalyst/latest/userguide/workflows-configure-runs.html in the Amazon CodeCatalyst User Guide.
